CustomField.description: his setting controls at what stage the records processed and modified by this AG are committed to Database
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Per Processed Record: Each modified record will be committed right after its processing and before processing next record starts i.e. one commit (DML) per record; Per Assignment Group: All records processed and modified by the AG will be committed after processing them all i.e. only 1 commit (DML) for all records modified by AG. Automatic: Based on AG's configuration, Q-assign decides whether to use 'Per Processed Record' or 'Per Assignment Group' commit
CustomField.label: Records Commit Setting
